Literature.Title: Purification, Characterization, and Mode of Action of Plantaricin GZ1-27, a Novel Bacteriocin against Bacillus cereus.
Literature.Author: Du H, Yang J, Lu X, Lu Z, Bie X, Zhao H, Zhang C, Lu F

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus cereus AS1.1846(MIC=16µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19114(MIC=16µg/ml),Aspergillus niger AS3.6459(no activity data),Penicillium chrysogenum AS3.4356(no activity data),Rhizopus stolonifer AS3.2336(no activity data)
